publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1365 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Depleted Uranium-That the Parliament congratulates Dr Helen Caldicott, a paediatrician and president of the American Nuclear Policy Research Institute on her calls for the US military to clean up the depleted uranium scattered across Iraq to prevent future health problems such as cancer and birth defects; notes that the depleted uranium ammunition currently being used by the US military could seriously harm both service personnel and civilians living in the area for decades to come; further notes Dr Caldicott's calls for the US Government to compensate people with cancer related to depleted uranium, and calls on the Scottish Executive to put pressure upon the Ministry of Defence to stop the testing of depleted uranium at Dundrennan as a matter of urgency, undertake a full health investigation into the local area and fully compensate those individuals whose health has been affected by this substance.
